about.title: ABOUT ME
about.paragraph1: I am a versatile Full-Stack developer with solid experience in both the .NET ecosystem (.NET 9, Blazor) and JavaScript (React, Node.js). I specialize in the architecture of scalable enterprise applications.
about.paragraph2: I have proven ability to build end-to-end applications applying SOLID principles, security, and modern best practices. I excel at solving complex data engineering and performance problems.
about.paragraph3: I consider myself a proactive person with effective communication skills and a strong commitment to quality work.
about.paragraph4: Ready to take on new challenges and contribute to innovative projects!

institutions.institution: University of La Punta, San Luis
details: University Technical Degree in Software Development

responsibilities: Enterprise Architecture: Development of a scalable WMS complying with corporate audit standards.
Data Engineering: Massive Excel ingestion engine with cleaning algorithms and validation.
Security & Performance: Implementation of granular access control (RBAC) and Server-Side pagination for large data volumes.
Architecture & Security: RESTful API with double token JWT authentication and HttpOnly cookies.
Real-Time: Live chat with Socket.IO and integrated payment gateway.
Data Integrity: Shift validation logic using unique security codes.
Frontend Development: Site construction using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.
Security & Contact: Implementation of a contact module with HTML5 validation and anti-spam protection (Google reCAPTCHA v2).
Backendless Email: Integration of Formsubmit.co for efficient email management, solving redirection and sensitive data privacy challenges.
ERP Development: Customization of Dynamics 365 FO using X++.
SQL Optimization: Performance improvement in financial reports and complex queries.
Financial Modules: Implementation of custom entities and forms for billing and project management.

allProjects.title: WMS - International Logistics Management
allProjects.description: Custom-developed Warehouse Management System. Focused on high-performance bulk data entry and stock control.
allProjects.fullDescription: I developed a scalable WMS using the latest .NET 9. from design to configuration and deployment in production on IIS, ensuring high availability and environment management. The main challenge was handling the ingestion of massive Excel files with inconsistent data. I created automatic cleaning and type validation algorithms. In addition, I implemented granular access control (RBAC) with ASP.NET Identity and optimized performance using server-side pagination for smooth management of large volumes of data.

allProjects.title: P2P Rental Platform
allProjects.description: Digital marketplace for vehicle rental between individuals. Includes real-time chat and secure payments.
allProjects.fullDescription: A complete end-to-end platform. The focus was on security (HttpOnly cookies, CSRF protection) and real-time user experience. I implemented a chat with Socket.IO for owners and tenants to negotiate, and an integration with Mercado Pago to block funds as collateral. In addition, I designed shift validation logic using unique security codes to ensure the physical delivery of assets.

allProjects.title: Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations
allProjects.description: Customizations in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations for financial and project management modules.
allProjects.fullDescription: As part of Axxon Consulting, I participated in the development of customizations in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations using X++. I implemented custom entities, forms, tables, and fields for billing and project management processes. Creation and optimization of queries in SQL Server for internal reports. I collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to improve operational flows for clients in different sectors.

allProjects.title: Trombofilia Argentina
allProjects.description: Informational and contact website for a health NGO. Optimized for SEO and accessibility.
allProjects.fullDescription: Direct work with the client. A fast, accessible site with a secure contact system without complex backend was required. I integrated reCAPTCHA v2 and Formsubmit to manage emails securely and avoid spam.
